entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:11 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 02:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C

Humidity: 100 %

Wind: ENE 51 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
